title: Account Ban for 14 days
body:
Do you know why I got banned immediately after a teammate reported me? Because every game I use words like -removed by moderation- or f.u.c.k as the part of my speech. System picks it up automatically and when they report me I will always get a ban, since I just use these words all the time.

Oh, and they gave the chat for second game where I said only 2 swear words over the entire 40 min game. Ass-hole and a bitch. Both used neutrally. Not to insult. As if any of these may insult anyone anyway. Why team reported me? I honestly don't know. They were mental. I played top Urgot doing Ok, nothing special. In the middle of the game they started flaming me. Saying I'm down minions, I build wrong items (items were ok, tanky) and so on. I didn't feed nor did I say anything bad to anyone, as usual. It is so unfair that I get reported for a game where I did nothing wrong and I get suspended cause I called enemy Illaoi a "broken bitch", as a character of course, in my own chat.

Other game chat is from when A guy was rude to me after I reminded him to release a Herald in the mid lane. He said "STFU I know how to play"
I got angry and asked him what is the deal, and he insulted me further. I only once called him -removed by moderation- We won the game and didn't really argue anymore that much. I didn't even think he would report me but people abuse this system.

I was in the middle of champion selection and the game kicked me out now saying that I'm banned now.

14 days. Nice treatment of players. I climbed to silver 4 and almost had my promos for silver 3. Just because some trolls and assholes intentionally insult you and report you after you call them something classic. 

Not only most of the community is toxic, you punish players who try to keep team together, try to make it enjoyable even if we lose. Good job Riot, 
After 14 days, I don't think I will come back. I will probably find some other time sink.

I've been here since late 2010 if I remember correctly. Back then, riot cared about community. Now they don't give a shit.

If someone knows a way to appeal this ban, please tell me. I can't submit a ticket, site just doesn't work for me. I don't know why.

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board
